info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 1:29PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark and north central Jefferson Counties through 200 PM MDT... At 128 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northwest of Helena, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Helena, Wolf Creek, Marysville, Craig, Rimini, Alhambra, Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Clancy, Canyon Creek and Austin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
